column2: "Hom mfa ndaase mma EWURADZE; na oye: Na n'ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa."
"Wɔmma hɔn a EWURADZE apon hɔn no nka dɛm
column3: Mekyerɛ hɔn a ɔapon hɔn efi ɔtamfo no nsamu no;"

column2: "Na ɔaboaboa hɔn ano efi asaase no do
column3: Efi boka na anee
column4: Efi kwaamu na pomu no a."

column2: "Wokyinkyiin sar no do wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ mu; Woennhu kurow biara a wɔtsena mu."
"Ɔkɔm na nsukɔm dzee hɔn
column3: Hɔn kra tɔɔ bitsi wɔ hɔn mu."

column2: "Nna wosui frɛɛ EWURADZE wɔ hɔn fona mu
column3: Na oyii hɔn fii hɔn ahokyer mu."

column2: "Ogyaa hɔn so faa kwan tsenenee mu
column3: Dɛ wɔnkɔ kurow a wɔtsena mu do."

column2: "Ao
column3: nkyɛ adasa eeyi EWURADZE ayɛw wɔ ne yieyɛ ntsi
column4: Na n'anwanwa ndwuma a ɔwɔ adasamba do ntsi!"

column2: "Na ɔmee ɔkra a ɔhaahaa no
column3: Na ɔkra a ɔkɔm dze no no ɔdze ndzepa hyɛ no ma."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtsenaa sum na owu no nwinwin mu
column3: Wɔakyekyer hɔn egu amandzehu na dadze mu;"

column2: "Osiandɛ wɔtseew Nyankopɔn asɛm do etua
column3: Na wobuu Ɔsorsornyi no n'apam tootooba:"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔdze ɔhaw brɛɛ hɔn akoma adze; Wɔhwee ase
column3: nna ɔboafo bi nnyi hɔ."

column2: "Nna wosui frɛɛ EWURADZE wɔ hɔn fona mu
column3: Na ɔgyee hɔn nkwa fii hɔn ahokyer mu."

column2: "Oyii hɔn fii sum na owu nwinwin mu
column3: Na obubuu hɔn mpokyerɛ mu esinesin."

column2: "Ao
column3: nkyɛ adasa eeyi EWURADZE ayɛw wɔ ne yieyɛ ntsi
column4: Na n'anwanwa ndwuma a ɔwɔ adasamba do ntsi!"

column2: "Osiandɛ oebubu boran aponkɛse no mu
column3: Na oetwitwa dadze adaban no mu esinesin."

column2: "Binom hɔn mbrato ntsi
column3: wɔyɛɛ mberɛw Na hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi

column2: "Hɔn kra kyir edziban horow nyinara; Na wɔtwe pin owu aponkɛse ho."
"Nna wosu frɛ EWURADZE wɔ hɔn fona mu
column3: Na ɔgye hɔn nkwa fi hɔn ahokyer mu."

column2: "Ɔsoma n'asɛm
column3: na ɔkɛsa hɔn yarba
column4: Na ɔgye hɔn fi hɔn sɛɛe mu."

column2: "Ao
column3: nkyɛ adasa eeyi EWURADZE ayɛw wɔ ne yieyɛ ntsi
column4: Na n'anwanwa ndwuma a ɔwɔ adasamba do ntsi!"

column2: "Na wɔmma wɔmbɔ ndaase afɔr
column3: Na wɔmfa adwontow nka no ndwuma nkyerɛ."

column2: "Hɔn a wosian kɔfow po ahɛn mu
column3: Na wokedzi dwuma wɔ esu akɛse mu;"

column2: "Woyinom na wohu EWURADZE no ndwuma
column3: Na n'anwanwadze wɔ ebun no mu."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛ
column3: na otu ehum

column2: "Wɔfow kɔ sor
column3: wosian kɔ ebun no mu bio: Hɔn kra nan wɔ ɔfona ntsi."

column2: "Wohima dzi akɔnaaba
column3: na wɔto ntentan dɛ ɔsabokwafo

column2: "Nna wosu frɛ EWURADZE wɔ hɔn fona mu
column3: Na oyi hɔn fi hɔn ahokyer mu."

column2: "Ɔma ehum no taa tsinkonn
column3: Na asorɛkye no so yɛ fɛmm."

column2: "Nna hɔn enyi gye dɛ hɔn ano adwe; Nna ɔdze hɔn kɔ ahɛngyinaa a wɔrohwehwɛ no mu."
"Ao
column3: nkyɛ adasa eeyi EWURADZE ayɛw wɔ ne yieyɛ ntsi
column4: Na n'anwanwa ndwuma a ɔwɔ adasamba do ntsi."

column2: "Wɔntonton no so wɔ ɔman no hɔn ehyiadzi mu
column3: Na wonyi no ayɛw wɔ mpanyimfo nguabɔ mu."

column2: "Ɔdan esutsen ma ɔyɛ sar do
column3: Na nsunyiwa ma ɔyɛ daadze kwawee;"

column2: "Asaaseber ma ɔyɛ nkyen sar
column3: Wɔ hɔn a wɔtse do hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi."

column2: "Ɔdan sar ma ɔyɛ nsutaae
column3: Na asaase kwawee ma ɔyɛ nsunyiwa."

column2: "Na hɔ na ɔma hɔn a ɔkɔm dze hɔn no kɛtsena
column3: Ama wɔaakyekyer kurow a wɔtsena mu;"

column2: "Na woeeduadua kwa
column3: na wɔaatsetsɛw wenyin nture

column2: "Ohyira hɔn so ma wɔdɔr pii; Na ɔmma hɔn anyɛmbowa do nnkuw."
"Bio so hɔn ho suar na wɔbrɛ adze Wɔ ahohiahia
column3: ɔfona

column2: "Ohue enyimtsia gu mbapɔmba do
column3: Na ɔma wokyin asaasefo mbrɛ kwan bi nnyi no do."

column2: "Naaso ɔdze ohianyi si sor fir amandzehu mu
column3: Na ɔma no mbusua dɛ nguankuw."

column2: "Atseneneefo bohu na hɔn enyi agye; Na emumuyɛ nyinara bomua n'ano."
"Obiara a ɔyɛ onyansafo no ma ɔnhyɛ yinom nsew
column3: Ma ɔndwendwen EWURADZE no mbɔbɔrhu ho."
